targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "disk" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "disk" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "disk" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "disk" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

list.name: service
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  WITH KEY = "service" where hostname =~ /^$hostname$/

list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "metric" where hostname =~ /^$hostname$/ AND service =~ /^$service/

list.name: windisk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "check_drivesize" WITH KEY = "metric" where hostname =~ /^$hostname$/ AND service =~ /^$service/
